meanings.def: the process of coming to live permanently in a different country from the one you were born in; the number of people who do this
examples: We are strongly supportive of immigration and multiculturalism.
immigration into… laws restricting immigration into the US
immigration from… There was an increase in immigration from Eastern Europe.
The power to enforce immigration laws lies with the federal government.
They announced measures to discourage illegal immigration.
The men were interviewed by immigration officials.

meanings.def: the place at a port, an airport, etc. where the passports and other documents of people coming into a country are checked
examples: We landed at Heathrow and went through customs and immigration.

related: United States Citizenship and Immigration Services
